FuncDef: The patch configuration-synchronize command synchronizes patch configurations and patch files from the active main control board to the standby main control board.
Examples: Info: Copied file cfcard:/ patch.pat to slave#cfcard:/patch.pat...Done.
Info: Succeeded to synchronize the patch configuration to slot 1.
Info: Finished synchronizing the patch package file and the patch configuration.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a standby main control board is replaced or a new one is added, you need to run this command to synchronize patch configurations and patch files from the active main control board to the standby main control board.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
